channel.title: Help for a 'noob' coder, please!
channel.description:
Hi all, I have been coding for less than 24 hours, and have picked up quite a few things to do with java.
I tried to follow a simple TUT to make a fighter torso minigame (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,140342.0.html), but got one error, it says:
client.java:15475:'else' without 'if'
please could sombody read this and tell me where i have gone wrong? I have obviously used 'else' without 'if' but i have followed the TUT very closely. If anybody needs to know, for some reason, the source i am using is Horror-Moss

item.title: Help for a 'noob' coder, please!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

post your code. i can fix it. post about 10 lines above the error, and 10 lines below.

Read full topic

item.title: Help for a 'noob' coder, please!
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

Haha, I can’t believe you all don’t know how to fix this simple error. (Except Range) Just delete else.

Read full topic

item.title: Help for a 'noob' coder, please!
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Hmm. I seriously don’t know what’s wrong, the compilers can be retarted sometimes hehe. I suggest you re-add the “mini-game”. Keeping in mind that you’ll have to delete everything you’ve added.

item.title: Help for a 'noob' coder, please!
item.dc:creator: @Il_Range_Il Il Range Il
item.description:
@Il_Range_Il wrote:

Trying it now, And also, great source :)[br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2007, 11:14:40 AM[/size][hr]Compiler says;

client.java:15475: ‘else’ without ‘if’
else if(useItemID == 4273 && atObjectID == 5162) {
^
1 error
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

i will try the else if thingy now, hold on a sec[br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2007, 11:16:37 AM[/size][hr]grr, im sorry for anoying you with these multi-posts, but i have no idea where i have put ‘else’ with no ‘if’, maybe we could talk on msn ?

Read full topic

item.title: Help for a 'noob' coder, please!
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Erm. You need to add an ‘if’ so it looks like;

else if

Instead of;

else

So, yeah. Paste what the compiler says exactly please, to do this;You simply right click it, select ‘Select all’ then hit return. Also, thanks for using my source, hehe.

Read full topic
